high_descs: Turn to the right and move towards the door then turn right and move to the center of the mat in front of the bed and then turn to the right.
Pick up the book next to the phone from the bed.
Turn around and move towards the tiled floor and then turn right and face the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser next to the digital alarm clock.
anns.task_desc: Examine a book by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn right, walk around the bed to the end of the bed
Grab the book on the bed
Turn around, walk to the cabinet
Turn on the lamp on the cabinet
anns.task_desc: Grab the book on the bed, turn on the lamp on the cabinet

high_descs: Turn right and walk around to the front of the bed
Pick up the book next to the cell phone from the bed
Turn around and walk over to the lamp on the wooden dresser
Turn on the lamp on the dresser
anns.task_desc: Examine the book under light of the lamp
